name: atlassian-data-center
title: Atlassian Data Center
description: Search Confluence and Jira Data Center with CQL/JQL syntax support
author: tofrankie

preferences.name: confluenceBaseUrl
preferences.title: Confluence Base URL
preferences.description: Base URL of your Confluence Data Center instance (e.g. https://confluence.example.com)

preferences.name: confluencePAT
preferences.title: Confluence PAT
preferences.description: Your Confluence Personal Access Token for API authentication. Create it from: Profile → Personal Access Tokens → Create token

preferences.name: jiraBaseUrl
preferences.title: Jira Base URL
preferences.description: Base URL of your Jira Data Center instance (e.g. https://jira.example.com)

preferences.name: jiraPAT
preferences.title: Jira PAT
preferences.description: Your Jira Personal Access Token for API authentication. Create it from: Profile → Personal Access Tokens → Create token

preferences.name: paginationSize
preferences.title: Results Per Page
preferences.description: Number of search results per page (default: 20)

preferences.name: replaceCurrentUser
preferences.title: Replace currentUser
preferences.description: Replace currentUser() with username when copying CQL/JQL
preferences.label: Replace currentUser() with username when copying CQL/JQL

commands.name: confluence-search-content
commands.title: Search Content
commands.subtitle: Confluence Data Center
commands.description: Search Confluence pages, blog posts, comments, and attachments

commands.name: jira-board-view
commands.title: Board View
commands.subtitle: Jira Data Center
commands.description: View active sprint issues on Jira board

preferences.name: jiraDailyWorkHours
preferences.title: Work per day
preferences.description: Daily work hours for worklog progress calculation (default: 8h, max 2 decimal places)

commands.name: jira-manage-field
commands.title: Manage Field
commands.subtitle: Jira Data Center
commands.description: Manage custom fields for Jira issue search
